channel.title: Wielding Requrments help
channel.description:
Ok well this is the last thing I need to finish off my source. FormationX [PI] base.
I need to make different levels of donator for equipping items. In ItemAssistant (my req is c.Donatorreq) I set the Donatorreq to 2, but the item works on isMember = 1.
So bassically what I need to know how how to set a new Requirement in ItemAssistant for something like c.SuperDonatorreq = 1 (isMember = 2 in character files).
I know it's basic, but my knowledge of Java is limited and I can't find where it's at.
I tried to put this in the best way I can, didn't really know how to say it.

[/quote]
mhm[/quote]
send me a message please and delete your inbox so i can reply

Read full topic

item.title: Wielding Requrments help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:3, topic:408226”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=509509.msg3696576#msg3696576 date=1312474209]

[/quote]

Thanks mate, your one of the few people who I actually respect on this site.

EDIT: It doesn’t do anything if I add

if(c.Donatorreq == 2) {
							if(c.isDonator < 2) {
								c.sendMessage("You need to be a Super Donator to use this.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}

In fact the message didn’t change at all after I compiled. I changed it from

you need to be a donator to wear this.

to

You need to be a Donator to use this.

Help?[/quote]
Just read this.

If it’s a cape you have to add a new slot, and add
c.Donatorreq = 1; under the case ID’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Wielding Requrments help
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

imsuperman05:

if(Config.itemRequirements) {

Thanks mate, your one of the few people who I actually respect on this site.

EDIT: It doesn’t do anything if I add

if(c.Donatorreq == 2) {
							if(c.isDonator < 2) {
								c.sendMessage("You need to be a Super Donator to use this.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}

In fact the message didn’t change at all after I compiled. I changed it from

you need to be a donator to wear this.

to

You need to be a Donator to use this.

Help?

Read full topic
